participant_1.name: Liam
participant_1.personality: thoughtful and observant, enjoys storytelling and sharing experiences.
participant_1.background: I want a home with a large enough space to host my tutoring sessions. I don t like acting. My parents are both over age 100. I keep my blue and hazel eyes open and take mental notes of the world around me. My family is a family of storytellers, and we are all passionate about sharing our stories with the world.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: creative and nurturing, finds joy in family and artistic pursuits.
participant_2.background: My days are spent working, exercising, and trying to balance my work and family life. I grew up in Alabama. I want to decorate my home with vintage furniture. We help each other out in my family. I've started creating my own comics and presenting them to publishers.

content.text: I'm good! I'm just taking some time to relax after a long day of work.
I'm glad to hear that! What do you do for work?
I'm a tutor, and I also do some writing on the side.
That's great! I'm a stay-at-home mom, but I'm also trying to start my own comic book series.
That's awesome! What's your comic book about?
It's about a group of friends who go on adventures together.
That sounds really cool! I'd love to read it when it's finished.
Thanks! I'll let you know when it's ready.
Great! What do you like to do for fun?
I love to read, write, and spend time with my family.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I love to read and write too.
We should get together sometime and talk about books!
That would be great! I'd love to meet you.
Great! Let's exchange numbers and we can make plans.
Sounds good! I'm looking forward to it
